posts.text:
2G: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - SIM 1 & SIM 2 (dual-SIM model only) 
3G: HSDPA 850 / 900 / 2100 
4G: LTE band 1(2100), 3(1800), 7(2600), 8(900), 20(800) 
Bluetooth: 4.2, A2DP, LE 
Chipset: Qualcomm MSM8909 Snapdragon 210 
Edge: Yes 
Fleiri eiginleikar: - MP4/H.264 player 
- MP3/WAV/eAAC+/Flac player 
- Photo/video editor 
- Document viewer 
Gprs text: Yes 
GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS 
GPU: Adreno 304 
Innbyggt minni: 16 GB, 2 GB RAM 
Minniskortarauf: microSD, up to 32 GB 
Myndavél að framan: 5 MP 
Myndavéla eiginleikar: Geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, HDR 
Myndbandsupptaka: 720p@30fps 
Örgjörvi: Quad-core 1.3 GHz Cortex-A7 
SIM: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by) 
Skynjarar: Accelerometer, proximity 
Speed: HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat4 150/50 Mbps 
Stærð: 146.3 x 73.2 x 8.2 mm (5.76 x 2.88 x 0.32 in) 
Upplausn: 720 x 1280 pixels, 16:9 ratio (~294 ppi density) 
USB: microUSB 2.0, USB On-The-Go 
Útgáfuár: 2018, February 
Útvarp: FM radio 
WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot 
Þyngd: 152 g (5.36 oz)
